      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16951112">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951112">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951112">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951112">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951112" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951113">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951113">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951113">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951113">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951113" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20429143">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20429143">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20429143">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20429143">
          <div id="boxatt20429143" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23836452">
              <a id="link_23836452" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23836452,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640055}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An expanding range of Oxfordâ€™s acclaimed art reference works: Grove Art Online, the Benezit Dictionary of Artists, the Encyclopedia of Aesthetics, The Oxford Companion to Western Art, and The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Art Terms, as well as many specially commissioned articles and bibliographies available exclusively online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23836450">
              <a id="link_23836450" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23836450,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951114">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951114">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951114">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951114">
          <div id="boxatt16951114" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19994390">
              <a id="link_19994390" href="http://www.aaa.si.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19994390,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19994390}); ">
               Archives of American Art
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains oral histories and other interviews.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951115">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951115">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951115">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951115">
          <div id="boxatt16951115" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23838745">
              <a id="link_23838745" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23838745,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23836417">
              <a id="link_23836417" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23836417,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728731}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951116">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951116">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951116">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Newspapers
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951116">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951116" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23836435">
              <a id="link_23836435" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://bsc.chadwyck.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23836435,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275295}); ">
               Black Studies Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Historical and current material for researching the past, present and future of African-Americans, the wider African Diaspora, and Africa itself. Scholarly essays, recent periodicals, historical newspaper articles, a periodical index, and more, combined from several resources: Schomburg Studies on the Black Experience, International Index to Black Periodicals (IIBP), The Chicago Defender, and the Black Literature Index. The database is a rich source of full text peer-reviewed journals such as Africa Policy Journal, African American Review, African Arts, African Economic History, African Studies Quarterly, Africana, and scores of others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23838938">
              <a id="link_23838938" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23838938,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951117">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951117">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951117">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951117">
          <div id="boxatt16951117" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23839046">
              <a id="link_23839046" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23839046,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23838948">
              <a id="link_23838948" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23838948,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index and selected full text from art periodicals, 1929-present. Full text journals include Architects' Journal, Art Bulletin, and Art Journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23836438">
              <a id="link_23836438" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://bsc.chadwyck.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23836438,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275295}); ">
               Black Studies Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Historical and current material for researching the past, present and future of African-Americans, the wider African Diaspora, and Africa itself. Scholarly essays, recent periodicals, historical newspaper articles, a periodical index, and more, combined from several resources: Schomburg Studies on the Black Experience, International Index to Black Periodicals (IIBP), The Chicago Defender, and the Black Literature Index. The database is a rich source of full text peer-reviewed journals such as Africa Policy Journal, African American Review, African Arts, African Economic History, African Studies Quarterly, Africana, and scores of others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23858544">
              <a id="link_23858544" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23858544,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23839051">
              <a id="link_23839051" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23839051,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African American Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of more than 300 scholarly history journals, all full text. As an archive, there is typically a lag time of 3-5 years from publication until new issues appear in JSTOR. Full text journals include American Historical Review, Journal of American History, Journal of American Studies, Review in American History, Comparative Studies in Society and History, Cultural Critique, Eighteenth Century Studies, Environmental History, Historical Journal, and History and Theory.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4610734" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16951118">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951118">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951118">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951118">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951118" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951119">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951119">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951119">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951119">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951119" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
